mapper.insert: insert into pic_app_mes (app_id, app_subject, introduce, user_id, money, solve, amazing, region) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{solve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amazing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pic_app_mes set app_subject = #{appSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_time = #{appTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, solve = #{solve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amazing = #{amazing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, right_user_id = #{rightUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select app_id, app_subject, introduce, user_id, app_time, money, solve, amazing, right_user_id, region from pic_app_mes where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select app_id, app_subject, introduce, user_id, app_time, money, solve, amazing, right_user_id, region from pic_app_mes
select app_id from pic_app_mes where app_id = (select MAX(app_id) from pic_app_mes)
select app_id, app_subject, introduce, user_id, app_time, money, solve, amazing, right_user_id, region from pic_app_mes where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select app_id, app_subject, introduce, user_id, app_time, money, solve, amazing, right_user_id, region from pic_app_mes where region like '%${region}%' and solve = #{solve,jdbcType=INTEGER}
